spas.nhandling

Class NReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • spas.nhandling.NReader

  • public class NReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for getting Object-representation of requested information from the Noppa API. Works in tandem with XMLParser.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String key
      The development key required to access content from the Noppa API.
      private java.lang.String URLBase
      The first part of the URL required to connect to Noppa API.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrganizations

        public java.util.List<NElement> getOrganizations()
        Get the organizations of Aalto University.
        Returns:
        List of organizations, or an empty list, if there was a problem with the connection.

      • getDepartments

        public java.util.List<NElement> getDepartments(java.lang.String organizationID)
        Get the departments of Aalto University, or from a specific organization within it.
        Parameters:
        organizationID - The organization, from which the departments are from (can be null, in which case it will return all departments).
        Returns:
        List of departments, or an empty list, if there was a problem with the connection.

      • getCourses

        public java.util.List<NCourse> getCourses(java.lang.String organizationID,
                                 java.lang.String departmentID,
                                 java.lang.String search)
        Get courses from within Aalto University, according to given search parameters. Must give at least one parameter.
        Parameters:
        organizationID - The organization, from which to search.
        departmentID - The department, from which to search.
        search - The keyword for search.
        Returns:
        List of courses, or an empty list, if there was a problem with the connection.

      • getCourseOverview

        public NCourse getCourseOverview(java.lang.String courseID,
                        java.lang.String courseName)
        Getting a more detailed version of given course.
        Parameters:
        courseID - The ID of the course, from which to get info.
        courseName - The name of the course, from which to get info.
        Returns:
        The course for which the overview was for, or a new Course, if there was something wrong with the connection.

      • getCourseLectures

        public java.util.List<NEvent> getCourseLectures(NCourse course)
        Method for getting the lectures of given course.
        Parameters:
        course - The course, from which to get the lectures.
        Returns:
        List containing the lectures for given course, or an empty list, if something went wrong with the connection.

      • getCourseExercises

        public java.util.List<NEvent> getCourseExercises(NCourse course)
        Method for getting the exercises of given course.
        Parameters:
        course - The course, from which to get the exercises.
        Returns:
        List containing the exercises for given course, or an empty list, if there was a problem with the connection.

      • getCourseAssignments

        public java.util.List<NEvent> getCourseAssignments(NCourse course)
        Method for getting the assignments of given course.
        Parameters:
        course - The course, from which to get the assignments.
        Returns:
        List containing the assignments for given course, or an empty list if there was a problem with the connection.

      • getCourseEvents

        public java.util.List<NEvent> getCourseEvents(NCourse course)
        Method for getting other events of given course. Other events are events that are neither lectures, exercises nor assignments.
        Parameters:
        course - The course, from which to get the other events.
        Returns:
        List of this course's other events, or an empty list, if there was a problem with the connection.

      • openConnection

        public org.xml.sax.InputSource openConnection(java.lang.String URL)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        The method for getting InputSource of the appropriate XML-file from the Noppa API.
        Parameters:
        URL - The appropriate part of Noppa API you want to connect to. For example "course".
        Returns:
        The InputSource for the asked XML-file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When something goes wrong with connecting to Noppa API.

      • openConnection

        public org.xml.sax.InputSource openConnection(java.lang.String URL,
                                     java.lang.String parameter1)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        The method for getting InputSource of the appropriate XML-file from the Noppa API.
        Parameters:
        URL - The appropriate part of Noppa API you want to connect to. For example "course".
        parameter1 - The parameter for when searching departments from inside an organization.
        Returns:
        The InputSource for the asked XML-file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When something goes wrong with connecting to Noppa API.

      • openConnection

        public org.xml.sax.InputSource openConnection(java.lang.String URL,
                                     java.lang.String parameter1,
                                     java.lang.String parameter2,
                                     java.lang.String parameter3)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        The method for getting InputSource of the appropriate XML-file from the Noppa API.
        Parameters:
        URL - The appropriate part of Noppa API you want to connect to. For example "course".
        parameter1 - Search parameters for when you are searching for courses. At least one must be given for the search to succeed.
        parameter2 - Search parameters for when you are searching for courses. At least one must be given for the search to succeed.
        parameter3 - Search parameters for when you are searching for courses. At least one must be given for the search to succeed.
        Returns:
        The InputSource for the asked XML-file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When something goes wrong with connecting to Noppa API.
